info.description: API for Campus Lost & Found System
info.title: Campus Lost & Found API

post.description: Create asset and generate QR code

get.description: Get a list of assets reported as lost
Get all assets belonging to the authenticated user

get.summary: Get found events for an asset

post.description: Report that an asset has been found by scanning QR
Get new access token using refresh token
Register a new user with email and password

get.description: Get a list of all items (Lost & Found) with optional filters

post.description: Report an item found without QR code
Report a lost item without QR code

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific item

delete.description: Delete an item (Finder or Owner only)

post.summary: Submit a claim for an item

get.description: Get all claims for an item (Finder only)
Get notifications for the authenticated user
Get a list of all users

put.description: Update authenticated user's name and/or phone

get.description: Get a specific user by their ID

finder_id.description: Can be nil if anonymous scan? No, prompt says FinderID FK. Assuming authenticated finder or security.
